name: Outbreak Definitive Collection
description:
The definitive retro survival horror nightmare awaits as you fight through five adventures in the Outbreak series - optimized and enhanced for the next generation.

The apocalypse has torn the world apart and you'll need all of your wits and a bit of luck to make it out alive - even with a friend along in co-op. From intense over-the-shoulder precision to fixed camera tactical action, you'll be forced to manage a tight inventory, search for clues, solve puzzles and fight off the undead. Every bullet counts as you make the most of your extremely limited supplies to try to reach evac.

Can you survive these intensely traumatic experiences and make it out alive... or will you simply be yet another victim of the undead? Good luck - you're going to need it!
